text: Tiniharumadhye jasala'i timile aphno avajabata bahaka'una sakchau, bahaka'umdai gara, ra uniharumathi aphna ghodasavara ra paidala sipahiharubata akramana gardaigara, ra tiniharuko mala ra santanaharuma pani aphu sam'milita humdaigara, ra tiniharusita jhutha vaca gardaigara. Ra saitanale jatipani vaca tiniharusamga garne gardacha tyo sabai dhoka ho
